channel.title: sbt on Sparrow10
channel.description: Recent content in sbt on Sparrow10

item.title: How to start a Scala.js project
item.description: Scala.js is a Scala to JavaScript compiler. In this post, we are going to see a couple of ways to start a project. Foremost we need to install sbt and node.js (I prefer to use nvm which allows us to install and use different versions). One way to start a project in Scala is using a giter8 template. For Scala.js there is no template from official sources, but some were created by third parties.
